channel.title: Alkoy A1 Framework release
channel.description:
Hey as I said I would release a frame work, well technically it isn't a framework but what ever, a base this release is Alkoy A1.
I have made a Packaged version, and Unpackaged for people who like to package things them selves.
Okay lets get down to buisness ;)
Link: [url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/12213315/Alkoy%20A1.zip]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/12213315/Alkoy%20A1.zip[/url]
What I've done:
[B]Client class:[/B] Creates a new accessable client for the logprocedure then writes to output stream, read the instream at a specific value takes all codes for login
[B]Constants class:[/B] Any common/uncommon constant belongs here.
[B] EventManager:[/B] Grahams EventManager.
[B]ISAACRandomGen:[/B] Self explanatory, wasn't created by me.
[B]Stream:[/B] Self explanatory.
[B] Logger / SimpleTimer:[/B] Nick's SimpleTimer.
[B]Player:[/B] Sends the player connection upto loggin point.
[B]PlayerData:[/B] Shows / represents one player in the loggin server.
[B]Server:[/B] Handles static player(s).
[B]Threader:[/B] Builds the new gamethread.
[B]UserUts:[/B] Checks if name is allowed, changes name into long returns etc.
Feel free to download and use, I never finished it as you can see but if someone finishes it feel free to PM me or Msg me on msn (:
Goodluck.

item.title: Alkoy A1 Framework release
item.dc:creator: @Kaex Kaex
item.description:
@Kaex wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=Mendorphins link=topic=478282.msg3501552#msg3501552 date=1297773769]

[quote author=runewings317 link=topic=478282.msg3501550#msg3501550 date=1297773631]

Runewings, please fuck off.
[/quote]What, you like my siggy? I’m not the only one who thinks that

You can’t even get death’s name right.
[/quote]Nor my name.

@Runewings, I said fuck off because you’re trolling.[/quote]

Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Alkoy A1 Framework release
item.dc:creator: @Kaex Kaex
item.description:
@Kaex wrote:

Wintercanon:

I read your framework, package names aren’t very informative. But otherwise this is a good start

Its basically Winterlove packaging lol, could’nt really be assed with packaging as it does not bother me.

Mendorphins:

I downloaded for future use (when I know what I’m doing) as I will have to learn player rendering lol. Is it 317 or 377?

Its 317.

Wintercanon:

I agree with I Vain I, you should use blakeman8192’s StreamBuffer and Graham’s ISAACCipher (with their permission of course). Packets are easy to handle, you only need to handle a basic few (walking and chatting) if you’re looking to release a framework for others to develop with. I suggest using an ArrayList for packet management as apposed to a HashMap, as I Vain I and I had problems with a HashMap in our server.

I’ve seen arraylist used in PI.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

Taken from Urban Dictionary:

Being a prick on the internet because you can. Typically unleashing one or more cynical or sarcastic remarks on an innocent by-stander, because it’s the internet and, hey, you can.
Guy: “I just found the coolest ninja pencil in existence.”
Other Guy: “I just found the most retarded thread in existence.”

Trolling is the act of purposefully antagonizing other people on the internet, generally on message boards. When done in a moderated internet community, this can result in banning. When done to uptight people such as fundies, this can result in hilarity.

[quote=“Kaex, post:12, topic:382488”][quote author=Clawz fury link=topic=478282.msg3500919#msg3500919 date=1297728339]
Whoever is asking for pics is a complete idiot.

@Kaex: Good Job on this, I hope to create my own framework one day o:
[/quote]

Techically it isn’t a framework but ok lol. And I said the same thing to Vain he give me a list of shit to study and so I did.

Suggestion, use blake’s StreamBuffer. ^.^

Ok, but why? Also, I’ve quit this. Got bored can’t do the fucking packets properly.[/quote]

Hey, I want a list from Vain too! Good work, Kaex.

item.title: Alkoy A1 Framework release
item.dc:creator: @Kaex Kaex
item.description:
@Kaex wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:14, topic:382488”][quote author=I Vain I link=topic=478282.msg3501046#msg3501046 date=1297733952]
I can help you with packets, but the reason I suggest the StreamBuffer is because the Stream class was originally ripped from deobs. Meaning, JaGeX owns that code, and can potentially shut you down for using it. (As well as the Cryption class)

The StreamBuffer is a legal version of the bytebuffers used in the Stream class. (Written by awesome blake<3)

So, message me on MSN and tell me what you need help with?
[/quote]

He would also have to crash patch this. ;)[/quote]

Yer too much work for me I get bored and move on too quickly.

[quote=“runewings317, post:15, topic:382488”][quote author=Kaex link=topic=478282.msg3500545#msg3500545 date=1297702406]

I WANT PICTURES!>:O

:3

No offence, but is that a troll? lol.
[/quote]What the fuck is a troll…[/quote]
Its a ridiculous comment that makes no sense ( I think ).

Read full topic
